Closing Entries

A closing entry is one that resets the balance of one or more temporary accounts. Closing entries transfer the balance of a temporary account to a permanent account such as retained earnings. Closing entries do not increase or decrease the amounts of assets, liabilities, or equity controlled by a company.

Where are closing entries represented?
Current PeriodPrevious Period
On Income StatementNoYes
On Balance SheetYesYes
On Unadjusted Trial BalanceNoYes
On Adjusted Trial BalanceNoYes
